Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Thermodynamic \Ther`mo*dy*nam"ic\, a. [Thermo- + dynamic.] (Physics) Relating to thermodynamics; caused or operated by force due to the application of heat. [1913 Webster]
{Thermodynamic function}. See {Heat weight}, under {Heat}. [1913 Webster]
thermodynamic adj : of or concerned with thermodynamics; "the thermodynamic limit" [syn: {thermodynamical}]
